uiEntry.title: button_battle1
uiEntry.tooltip: This tutorial is for beginners to Total War. It teaches the basics of moving and combat on the battlefield.

uiEntry.title: button_battle2
uiEntry.tooltip: This tutorial is for intermediate players. It explores battlefield combat in more detail, including group formations and special abilities.

uiEntry.title: button_battle3
uiEntry.tooltip: This tutorial is for those experienced in Total War. It explores the new battlefield features exclusive to Total War: Shogun 2

uiEntry.title: button_naval2
uiEntry.tooltip: This tutorial is for those experienced in Total War. It explores the new naval features exclusive to Total War: Shogun 2

uiEntry.title: button_naval1
uiEntry.tooltip: This tutorial is for beginners to Total War. It will teach the basics of naval warfare, such as sailing and combat.

uiEntry.title: button_campaign
uiEntry.tooltip: This tutorial takes you through a short campaign game. It also includes the beginner naval and battle tutorials.

state.title: NewState
state.stateText: For the duration of each of the battle tutorials all keyboard settings will be reset to their defaults.
